storyTitle: As Team Lead, I want to generate performance reports to evaluate team productivity

testCases.title: Validate performance report generation with KPI filters
preconditions: User is logged in with Team Lead role credentials
Performance management system has data available for the selected time period
User has necessary permissions to access performance reporting module
At least one team and employee exist in the system

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with options for KPI selection, filters, and time period selection

steps.action: Select desired KPIs from the available KPI dropdown list
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the report configuration

steps.action: Select team from the team filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter is applied and displayed in the filter summary section

steps.action: Select time period (start date and end date) using the date picker
steps.expectedResult: Time period is set and displayed correctly in the filter summary, filters accepted without errors

steps.action: Click on 'Generate Report' button to request report generation
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is generated and displayed with selected KPIs, charts, and metrics matching the applied filters

steps.action: Verify that the report contains accurate data for the selected team and time period
steps.expectedResult: Report displays correct KPI values, team information, and time period data with visual charts

postconditions: Performance report is displayed on screen
Report data matches the selected filters and KPIs
System logs the report generation activity
User remains on the performance reporting page

testCases.title: Verify export functionality for performance reports
preconditions: User is logged in with Team Lead role credentials
Performance reporting module is accessible
A performance report has been generated with filters applied
Browser allows file downloads
User has write permissions to the download directory

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module and select KPIs, team, and time period filters
steps.expectedResult: Filters are applied successfully

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate performance report with filters
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is displayed on screen with charts and data matching the selected filters

steps.action: Verify that the report contains visual charts and performance metrics
steps.expectedResult: Report shows complete data with charts, KPIs, and metrics

steps.action: Click on 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF export process and displays download progress

steps.action: Wait for PDF download to complete and open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is downloaded successfully with charts and data matching the on-screen report, including all visual elements

steps.action: Return to the performance report screen and click on 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel export process and displays download progress

steps.action: Wait for Excel download to complete and open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is downloaded with accurate data, all KPIs, metrics, and data points matching the report

steps.action: Verify data accuracy in both exported files against the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel exports contain identical data to the on-screen report with 100% accuracy

postconditions: PDF file is saved in the downloads folder with embedded charts
Excel file is saved in the downloads folder with accurate data
Both exported files contain complete report data
User remains on the performance reporting page
Export activity is logged in the system

testCases.title: Ensure unauthorized users cannot access performance reports
preconditions: System has role-based access control configured
A non-team lead user account exists in the system
Performance reporting module is active
API endpoint /api/reports/performance is protected with authentication

steps.action: Login to the system using non-team lead user credentials (e.g., regular employee role)
steps.expectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the appropriate dashboard for their role

steps.action: Attempt to navigate to the performance reporting module from the main menu or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance reporting module option is not visible in the navigation menu or is disabled

steps.action: Attempt to access the performance reporting module by directly entering the URL in the browser
steps.expectedResult: Access to performance reporting module is denied with an appropriate error message (e.g., 'Access Denied' or '403 Forbidden')

steps.action: Open browser developer tools and attempt to access the API endpoint GET /api/reports/performance directly
steps.expectedResult: API returns 403 Forbidden response with error message indicating insufficient permissions

steps.action: Verify that no performance data is returned in the API response
steps.expectedResult: No sensitive performance data is exposed, only an access forbidden response is received

steps.action: Logout and login with Team Lead credentials, then access the performance reporting module
steps.expectedResult: Performance reporting module is accessible and displays correctly for authorized Team Lead user

postconditions: Unauthorized access attempt is logged in the security audit log
No performance data was exposed to unauthorized user
System security remains intact
User session remains active but without access to restricted module

storyTitle: As Team Lead, I want performance reports to include visual charts for easier data interpretation

testCases.title: Validate visual chart rendering in performance reports
preconditions: User is logged in with Team Lead role credentials
Performance reporting module is accessible
Performance data is available in the system for the selected period
Chart rendering library is loaded and functional
Multiple chart types (bar, line, pie) are available for selection

steps.action: Navigate to the performance reporting module from the dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance reporting interface is displayed with options for KPI selection and chart type customization

steps.action: Select desired KPIs from the KPI dropdown menu (e.g., productivity rate, task completion rate)
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the report configuration panel

steps.action: Select chart types for each KPI (e.g., bar chart for productivity, line chart for trends)
steps.expectedResult: Chart types are assigned to corresponding KPIs and displayed in the configuration summary

steps.action: Select team and time period filters for the report
steps.expectedResult: Filters are applied and displayed in the filter summary section

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate performance report with selected KPIs and chart types
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation and chart rendering to complete (should be within 10 seconds)
steps.expectedResult: Report displays with accurate visual charts representing the selected KPIs, charts render within 10 seconds

steps.action: Verify that each chart accurately represents the corresponding KPI data
steps.expectedResult: Charts display correct data points, labels, legends, and values matching the KPI metrics

steps.action: Change chart types for one or more KPIs using the customization options
steps.expectedResult: Chart type selection is updated in the interface

steps.action: Click 'Regenerate Report' or 'Update Charts' button to customize chart types and regenerate report
steps.expectedResult: System processes the customization request

steps.action: Wait for charts to update with new chart types
steps.expectedResult: Charts update according to customization, displaying the same data in the newly selected chart format within 10 seconds

steps.action: Verify data consistency between original and updated charts
steps.expectedResult: Data values remain consistent across different chart type representations

postconditions: Performance report is displayed with customized visual charts
Charts accurately represent KPI data
Chart rendering completed within performance SLA (10 seconds)
Report remains available for export
Chart customization settings are saved for the current session

testCases.title: Verify export of performance reports with embedded charts
preconditions: User is logged in with Team Lead role credentials
Performance report with visual charts has been generated
Charts are fully rendered on screen
Browser allows file downloads
User has write permissions to the download directory
PDF and Excel export functionality is enabled

steps.action: Navigate to performance reporting module and select KPIs and chart types
steps.expectedResult: Report configuration interface is displayed with selected options

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button to generate performance report with charts
steps.expectedResult: System generates and displays the performance report with visual charts (bar, line, or pie charts as selected)

steps.action: Verify that all charts are fully rendered and visible on screen
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with all charts rendered correctly, showing KPI data visually

steps.action: Note the chart types, data points, and visual elements displayed in the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: All chart details are clearly visible and documented for comparison

steps.action: Click on 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF export process with embedded charts and displays download progress

steps.action: Wait for PDF download to complete and open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file downloads successfully and opens without errors

steps.action: Verify that the PDF includes all embedded charts with correct visual representation
steps.expectedResult: PDF includes embedded charts matching the on-screen report, all visual elements (colors, labels, data points) are preserved

steps.action: Return to the performance report screen and click on 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel export process with embedded charts and displays download progress

steps.action: Wait for Excel download to complete and open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file downloads successfully and opens without errors

steps.action: Verify that the Excel file includes embedded charts as chart objects
steps.expectedResult: Excel file includes embedded charts as visual objects, charts are interactive and maintain data accuracy

steps.action: Compare charts in both exported files against the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Charts in PDF and Excel exports match the on-screen report in terms of data accuracy, visual representation, and formatting

postconditions: PDF file is saved with embedded visual charts
Excel file is saved with embedded chart objects
Both exported files contain accurate chart representations
Chart data integrity is maintained across all formats
Export activity is logged in the system
User remains on the performance reporting page
